title: Stalled sync

labels.name: scope-testnet-debugging
labels.description: Issues uncovered through running a node on a public testnet.

body:
Probably related to #1047 

Syncing witti, eventually the initial sync stalled completely, no further progress, even with 4 peers

the last logs present:

